articles.description: 2021 Audi A4 facelift prices will be announced on coming 5th January. Pre-bookings of the updated model have already been commenced at a token sum of Rs 2 lakh. One can reserve the sedan at Audi’s authorized dealerships or its official website. Production of …

articles.title: SEBI appoints former chief election commissioner as observer for Franklin Templeton e-voting - Moneycontrol.com
articles.description: Supreme Court had directed SEBI to appoint observer for Franklin Templeton’s e-voting earlier this month.
articles.content: The Securities and Exchange Board of India (SEBI) has appointed Taruvai Subayya Krishnamurthy, the former chief election commissioner of India as the observer for e-voting on the winding-up of six sc… [+1953 chars]
